div.p: A carry over from the TEI, DOCEDITOR is an element that contains the name of the editor of the document at hand. Currently this element is not used, because the Orlando Project has implemented a much more robust method of tracking document responsibility through its responsibility element. It is contained within the FILEDESC--TITLESTMT area of the ORLANDOHEADER. It has no sub-elements. It has one unique attribute, role, which has a default value of editor. Do not use this element unless otherwise instructed.
